00011 #include "AtomDisplaceMove.h"
00012 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/McSystem.h>
00013 #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00014 #include <mcMd/potentials/pair/McPairPotential.h>
00015 #endif
00016 #include <util/boundary/Boundary.h>
00017 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Molecule.h>
00018 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Atom.h>
00019 #include <util/space/Vector.h>
00020 #include <util/space/Dimension.h>
00021 #include <util/global.h>
00022 
00023 namespace McMd
00024 {
00025 
00026    using namespace Util;
00027 
00028    /* 
00029    * Constructor
00030    */
00031    AtomDisplaceMove::AtomDisplaceMove(McSystem& system) 
00032     : SystemMove(system),
00033       delta_(0.0),
00034       speciesId_(-1)
00035    {}
00036    
00037    /* 
00038    * Read speciesId and delta.
00039    */
00040    void AtomDisplaceMove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00041    {
00042       readProbability(in);
00043       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00044       read<double>(in, "delta", delta_);
00045    }
00046    
00047    /* 
00048    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a move.
00049    */
00050    bool AtomDisplaceMove::move() 
00051    { 
00052       Vector    oldPos;
00053       double    newEnergy, oldEnergy;
00054       Molecule* molPtr;
00055       Atom*     atomPtr;
00056       int       iAtom;
00057 
00058       incrementNAttempt();
00059 
00060       // Choose a molecule and atom at random
00061       molPtr  = &(system().randomMolecule(speciesId_));
00062       iAtom   = random().uniformInt(0, molPtr->nAtom());
00063       atomPtr = &molPtr->atom(iAtom);
00064 
00065       // Calculate current pair energy and store old position
00066       oldPos    = atomPtr->position();
00067       oldEnergy = system().atomPotentialEnergy(*atomPtr);
00068 
00069       for (int j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00070          atomPtr->position()[j] += random().uniform(-delta_, delta_);
00071       }
00072       boundary().shift(atomPtr->position());
00073       newEnergy = system().atomPotentialEnergy(*atomPtr);
00074 
00075       // Decide whether to accept forward move
00076       bool accept = random().metropolis(boltzmann(newEnergy - oldEnergy));
00077 
00078       if (accept) {
00079   
00080          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00081          system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*atomPtr);
00082          #endif
00083          incrementNAccept();
00084 
00085       } else {
00086    
00087          atomPtr->position() = oldPos;
00088    
00089       }
00090       return accept;
00091    }
00092 
00093 }      
00094 #endif
